long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A theme for my browser made for a friend.

This is a different theme for my other browsers,

This is a browser for Chromebooks. It allows you to go to websites like YouTube, SoundCloud, Amazon, and more if you don't want to use Chrome. An example of where this might be useful is if a Chrome extension is making a website stop working and you want to test it with a different browser.


This is a fork of Leaf Browser at https://github.com/samlanning/leaf-browser

(this was a request from a friend)
